content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":128301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes!\""},{"lineNumber":128302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう……たんこぶ出来ちゃってる……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch... I've got a bump...\""},{"lineNumber":128303,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いたた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That hurts...\""},{"lineNumber":128304,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは叩かれた頭をすりすりと撫でた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiruru rubbed the head that was hit."},{"lineNumber":128305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":128306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……えへへ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hehe.\""},{"lineNumber":128307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら〜、なにしてる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, what are you doing!\""},{"lineNumber":128308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわっ！　待って下さい、ランス様〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! Please wait, Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":128309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、モンスターですよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, those are monsters!\""},{"lineNumber":128310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　助けを呼んだ方が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We should probably call for help...\""},{"lineNumber":128311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「必要ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No need."},{"lineNumber":128312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この程度の雑魚、俺とお前で楽勝だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"These weaklings, you and I will easily defeat them!\""},{"lineNumber":128313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははー！　行くぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! Let's go!\""},{"lineNumber":128314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわわ〜っ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah!\""},{"lineNumber":128315,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、なんか妙だぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, something's strange...\""},{"lineNumber":128316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah!\""},{"lineNumber":128317,"originalJapaneseLine":"「攻撃する際に必要なAPが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The AP needed to attack"},{"lineNumber":128318,"originalJapaneseLine":"　前より増えているではないか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"has increased compared to before!\""},{"lineNumber":128319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、シィル！　なんだこれは！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Shiruru! What is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":128320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら同じ行動を連続で使用すると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems that if you use the same action repeatedly,"},{"lineNumber":128321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必要APが増えてしまうようですねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"the required AP increases...\""},{"lineNumber":128322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむ、そうなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":128323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つまり、上手くローテーションを組んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In other words, if you cleverly rotate your actions,"},{"lineNumber":128324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　モンスターを攻撃した方がお得ってことだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's better to attack monsters that way.\""},{"lineNumber":128325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、一度使った行動は1ターン休憩すると","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, once you use an action, if you rest for one turn,"},{"lineNumber":128326,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元に戻るみたいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"it seems the AP cost returns to normal.\""},{"lineNumber":128327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も上手く使って下さいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please use me skillfully too.\""},{"lineNumber":128328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah!\""},{"lineNumber":128329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":128330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、今です、チャンスです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, now is the chance!\""},{"lineNumber":128331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見て下さい、モンスターの弱点が炎です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Look, the monster's weakness is fire.\""},{"lineNumber":128332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の攻撃属性は炎なので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My attack element is fire,"},{"lineNumber":128333,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が攻撃するとダメージボーナスがつきますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so if I attack, I'll get a damage bonus.\""},{"lineNumber":128334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うむ、そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah, that's right."},{"lineNumber":128335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分かっていたぞ、数少ないお前の出番だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I knew that, this is your rare moment to shine.\""},{"lineNumber":128336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、俺様の属性のチャンスはいつ来るのだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, when does my attribute chance come?\""},{"lineNumber":128337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺の属性マークは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My attribute mark is...\""},{"lineNumber":128338,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだこれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this?\""},{"lineNumber":128339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……無属性ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's attributeless."},{"lineNumber":128340,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごく珍しいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's really rare.\""},{"lineNumber":128341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが弱点となる敵さんは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Enemies weak to this... um..."},{"lineNumber":128342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well...\""},{"lineNumber":128343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いるのかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder if there are any...\""},{"lineNumber":128344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにィー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?!\""},{"lineNumber":128345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいひい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff huff...\""},{"lineNumber":128346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな疲れるような相手でもないだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They shouldn't be such tiring opponents.\""},{"lineNumber":128347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえ、でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, but..."},{"lineNumber":128348,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつ大群が現れたりするかと思ったら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm worried about when a large group might appear...\""},{"lineNumber":128349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数体のモンスターなら大丈夫ですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A few monsters are fine,"},{"lineNumber":128350,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やはり二人だけでウロウロするのは","translatedEnglishLine":"but wandering around with just the two of us"},{"lineNumber":128351,"originalJapaneseLine":"　危険ではないでしょうか、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"is dangerous, don't you think, Lord Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":128352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それは確かに」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That is true.\""},{"lineNumber":128353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":128354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この声は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who's voice is that?\""},{"lineNumber":128355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「探しましただー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've been looking for you!\""},{"lineNumber":128356,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":128357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぎゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fugya!\""},{"lineNumber":128358,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスキーックが炸裂。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's kick explodes."},{"lineNumber":128359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃあ、大丈夫ですか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa, are you okay!?\""},{"lineNumber":128360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロッキーさん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky-san!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あう……たんこぶ出来ちゃってる……
シィルは叩かれた頭をすりすりと撫でた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiruru rubbed the head that was hit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わわっ！　待って下さい、ランス様〜！」
「ランス様、モンスターですよ！
この程度の雑魚、俺とお前で楽勝だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These weaklings, you and I will easily defeat them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前より増えているではないか！」
「おい、シィル！　なんだこれは！？」
「どうやら同じ行動を連続で使用すると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems that if you use the same action repeatedly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要APが増えてしまうようですねぇ……」
「つまり、上手くローテーションを組んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words, if you cleverly rotate your actions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターを攻撃した方がお得ってことだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's better to attack monsters that way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、一度使った行動は1ターン休憩すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, once you use an action, if you rest for one turn,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元に戻るみたいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems the AP cost returns to normal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私も上手く使って下さいね」
「ランス様、今です、チャンスです！」
「見て下さい、モンスターの弱点が炎です」
私が攻撃するとダメージボーナスがつきますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if I attack, I'll get a damage bonus."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かっていたぞ、数少ないお前の出番だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I knew that, this is your rare moment to shine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、俺様の属性のチャンスはいつ来るのだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, when does my attribute chance come?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが弱点となる敵さんは……
「そんな疲れるような相手でもないだろ」
いつ大群が現れたりするかと思ったら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm worried about when a large group might appear..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数体のモンスターなら大丈夫ですが、
やはり二人だけでウロウロするのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but wandering around with just the two of us

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険ではないでしょうか、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is dangerous, don't you think, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスキーックが炸裂。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あう……たんこぶ出来ちゃってる……
シィルは叩かれた頭をすりすりと撫でた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiruru rubbed the head that was hit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わわっ！　待って下さい、ランス様〜！」
「ランス様、モンスターですよ！
この程度の雑魚、俺とお前で楽勝だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These weaklings, you and I will easily defeat them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前より増えているではないか！」
「おい、シィル！　なんだこれは！？」
「どうやら同じ行動を連続で使用すると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems that if you use the same action repeatedly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要APが増えてしまうようですねぇ……」
「つまり、上手くローテーションを組んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words, if you cleverly rotate your actions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターを攻撃した方がお得ってことだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's better to attack monsters that way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、一度使った行動は1ターン休憩すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, once you use an action, if you rest for one turn,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元に戻るみたいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems the AP cost returns to normal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私も上手く使って下さいね」
「ランス様、今です、チャンスです！」
「見て下さい、モンスターの弱点が炎です」
私が攻撃するとダメージボーナスがつきますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if I attack, I'll get a damage bonus."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かっていたぞ、数少ないお前の出番だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I knew that, this is your rare moment to shine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、俺様の属性のチャンスはいつ来るのだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, when does my attribute chance come?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが弱点となる敵さんは……
「そんな疲れるような相手でもないだろ」
いつ大群が現れたりするかと思ったら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm worried about when a large group might appear..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数体のモンスターなら大丈夫ですが、
やはり二人だけでウロウロするのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but wandering around with just the two of us

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険ではないでしょうか、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is dangerous, don't you think, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスキーックが炸裂。
